code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import TopBar from"../TopBar";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ViewImages(){const[images,setImages]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchImages=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get('/api/v1/images/userProfile',{headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`}});console.log('api response:',response.data);setImages(response.data.Images);}catch(error){console.log('error:',error);}};fetchImages();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("head",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[images.map((image,index)=>{const filename=image.replace(/^uploads[\\/]/,'');console.log(filename);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:3000/uploads/${filename}`,alt:`User Image ${index}`},index);}),";"]})})]});}export default ViewImages;
